title: HOLES
author: Louis Sachar
plot_summary: An unusual juvenile detention camp makes kids go into the desert and dig holes all day to teach them a lesson.... Seems useless, but one of them realizes that they're really digging for treasure!

title: ECHO
author: Pam Mu√±oz Ryan
plot_summary: Five stories link characters across two continents and show how music can overcome great fear and prejudice.

title: THE WEE FREE MEN
author: Terry Pratchett
plot_summary: A witch-in-training has to protect her home from the monsters of Fairyland with nothing but a frying pan and the help of a zany bunch of six-Inch-tall blue wild men.

title: THE CITY OF EMBER
author: Jeanne DuPrau
plot_summary: The underground city of Ember is the last home of all humans... but it's slowly running out of power. Lina bears a secret The secret might save everyone. Or It might ruin everything.

title: ARU SHAH AND THE END OF TIME
author: Roshani Chokshi
plot_summary: When 12-year-old Aru Shah accidentally wakes an ancient demon, she must team up with the legendary Pandava brothers and travel to the Kingdom of Death to stop the god of destruction.

title: OTHER WORDS FOR HOME
author: Jasmine Warga
plot_summary: The story of Jude, who moves from Syria to the United States during a civil war, leaving behind everything she's ever known. Finding yourself is hard enough for a teenager, but finding yourself in an unfamiliar country, where sometimes it feels like you're not welcome, is even harder.

title: THE PARKER INHERITANCE
author: Varian Johnson
plot_summary: When Candace and her mom move into her late grandmother's old house, she stumbles upon a mysterious letter, with a clue to the location of a lost fortune. Will Candace be able to put the pieces together and solve this mystery?

title: AMERICAN BORN CHINESE
author: Gene Luen Yang
keywords: Action-packed fable with a surprise twist
plot_summary: Three stories that answer: What happens when you're the only Chinese American student at your new school? Who is the Monkey King? And how do you ruin your cousin's life?

title: ENDER'S GAME
author: Orson Scott Card
plot_summary: Ender is chosen by the military to fly to a space station to practice battle simulations against an invading force of bug-like aliens. But Battle School is hard enough to survive on its own.

title: THE WITCH OF BLACKBIRD POND
author: Elizabeth George Speare
plot_summary: In colonial Connecticut, 16-year-old Kit is lonely... and her only friend, Hannah, is suspected of being a witch.

title: A SINGLE SHARD
author: Linda Sue Park
plot_summary: An orphan in 12th-century Korea works for a strict but brilliant pottery master who is seeking a royal commission. A sad and subtle journey.

title: MY SIDE OF THE MOUNTAIN
author: Jean Craighead George
plot_summary: Sam runs away from home and sets up in a hollow tree in the Catskill Mountains. Now he just has to survive

title: THE HOUSE OF THE SCORPION
author: Nancy Farmer
plot_summary: Matt is the genetic clone of a drug lord. He lives in a compound where everybody hates him, and he has no idea why he was made.

title: THE THIEF
author: Megan Whalen Turner
plot_summary: A thief is hired by a magus to steal a jewel. The thief is clever. The magus is murderous. The story is unforgettable.

title: THE CROSSOVER
author: Kwame Alexander
plot_summary: Lyrical all-star basketball story told in poetry about a baller named Filthy McNasty. Read it out loud.

title: I MUST BETRAY YOU
author: Ruta Sepetys
plot_summary: A heartbreaking historical thriller. When Romania's secret police attempt to blackmail Cristian Florescu into becoming an informer. he must make a choice: betray everyone he knows and loves, or go up against a terrifying communist dictator-all by himself!

title: THE HOBBIT
author: J. R. R. Tolkien
plot_summary: Bilbo is a comfort-loving homebody until a wizard shows up at his door and whisks him off on an adventure full of hungry trolls, murky forests, magic rings, and dragon's gold.

title: SCYTHE
author: Neal Shusterman
plot_summary: The Scythedom is adding two more Scythes to the team. Are these two teens ready for the job of bringing death?
